dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, should there really be no upper age limit for driving, like, at all?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, should there really be no upper age limit for driving, like, at all?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely not. Kazakhstan seems to have it right, actually.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely not. Kazakhstan seems to have it right, actually.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the police department, there is no upper age limit for driving in Kazakhstan

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? People, uh, driving at 90, even 100? That just feelsâ€¦ unsafe.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? People, uh, driving at ninety, even one hundred? That just feels... unsafe.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: citizens can legally drive even at 80 or 90 years old.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Why is it unsafe if they're medically cleared? The article specifically says that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Why is it unsafe if they're medically cleared? The article specifically says that.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, but "certain restrictions," based on a "conclusion of medical professionals"? Is that really enough?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, but certain restrictions, based on a conclusion of medical professionals? Is that really enough?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: older drivers may face certain restrictions related to their health, based on the conclusion of medical professionals during the license renewal process or during a retest,

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It says "medical professionals" and during "renewal or retest." That sounds pretty thorough, um, to me.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It says medical professionals and during renewal or retest. That sounds pretty thorough, um, to me.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: based on the conclusion of medical professionals during the license renewal process or during a retest,

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Thorough? I mean, your reaction times, your eyesight, they just naturally, you know, decline past a certain point.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Thorough? I mean, your reaction times, your eyesight, they just naturally, you know, decline past a certain point.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Not for everyone, though! You can't just blanket-ban people based on, uh, an arbitrary number.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Not for everyone, though! You can't just blanket-ban people based on, uh, an arbitrary number.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Arbitrary? When thousands are on the road, including, like, very elderly citizens, public safety has to come first.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Arbitrary? When thousands are on the road, including, like, very elderly citizens, public safety has to come first.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Thousands of drivers in Kazakhstan get behind the wheel every day, including many elderly citizens.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Public safety is considered with the medical checks. If they have those "medical conditions," they lose the license. It's clear.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Public safety is considered with the medical checks. If they have those medical conditions, they lose the license. It's clear.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: If a driver has the following medical conditions, they will not be issued a license or may lose it during a routine medical examination:

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: But what about the near-misses? The, uh, slow reactions? Things that aren't quite "medical conditions" but still pose a risk?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But what about the near-misses? The, uh, slow reactions? Things that aren't quite medical conditions but still pose a risk?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: You're just assuming incompetence. I've seen plenty of reckless young drivers, too, you know. Should we cap them?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You're just assuming incompetence. I've seen plenty of reckless young drivers, too, you know. Should we cap them?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: That's a completely different issue. We're talking about, like, an inherent, age-related decline here.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's a completely different issue. We're talking about, like, an inherent, age-related decline here.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And I'm saying the system addresses that with professional medical evaluations. It's not, uh, a free-for-all.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And I'm saying the system addresses that with professional medical evaluations. It's not, uh, a free-for-all.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It just feels like it's a disaster waiting to happen, frankly. We need stricter rules.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It just feels like it's a disaster waiting to happen, frankly. We need stricter rules.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Stricter driver's license rules proposed in Kazakhstan

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Stricter than losing your license if you're unfit? How much stricter can you get?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Stricter than losing your license if you're unfit? How much stricter can you get?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Like, an actual, you know, cut-off age. For everyone's peace of mind.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Like, an actual, you know, cut-off age. For everyone's peace of mind.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, you'd rather take away independence from healthy 85-year-olds just because of their birth certificate? That's, um, ridiculous.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, you'd rather take away independence from healthy eighty five-year-olds just because of their birth certificate? That's, um, ridiculous.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It's about balancing freedom with, like, collective safety. And I don't think they've found that balance.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's about balancing freedom with, like, collective safety. And I don't think they've found that balance.

dialogue_turns.text: I think they absolutely have. It's fair.
